org.elkoserver.server.context

Interface UserMod

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GeneralMod, HabitatVerbs
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Avatar, Bag, Box, Census, Container, ContextKeyCap, Counter, Definer, DeviceUserMod, Dictionary, Flashlight, Ground, HabitatMod, Head, Image, Key, Knick_knack, Magical, Massive, NoteMaker, Openable, PrivateChat, Region, Rock, Short_sign, Sign, Switch, Table, TalkPrefs, Tree, Walkable, Wall

    public interface UserMod
    Marker Interface for mods that may be attached to users.

    The server will insist that any Mod subclass implement this before it will allow it to be attached to a User object.
